H0.text: What marine mammal's tusks were once thought to be from unicorns. Walrus

H1.text: What marine mammal's tusks were once thought to be from unicorns. Sperm Whale

H2.text: What marine mammal's tusks were once thought to be from unicorns. Hippopotamus

H3.text: What marine mammal's tusks were once thought to be from unicorns. Narval

A4.text: This stems from a medieval belief that narwhal tusks were the horns of the legendary unicorn.

A5.text: In Europe, narwhal tusks were highly sought after for centuries.
